definition: to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)

sentences.english: And the belshazzar also has a sauna.
Her face glowed when she came out of the sauna.
sentences.chinese: 當她從桑拿浴中出來時她的臉在發光。

sentences.english: The double-decked western - style design, the fine decoration, in the room has the independence the sauna room…
sentences.chinese: 雙層歐式設計，精緻的裝修，房間內有獨立的桑拿室。

sentences.english: A lot of competitors before have sat in higher temperatures than that.
sentences.chinese: 很多選手賽前曾體驗過溫度更高的桑拿浴。

sentences.english: It's as hot as in a sauna.
We are also equipped with sauna and massage rooms.
sentences.chinese: 我們也配備有桑拿室和按摩室。

sentences.english: You may try Sanna Clam. It is very tasty.
sentences.chinese: 您可以嚐嚐桑拿蛤蜊，味道很棒。

sentences.english: It can be a very effective method of breaking up a head cold.
sentences.chinese: 桑拿也可以十分有效的驅散頭傷風。

sentences.english: The gym and sauna are on the third floor.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿房在三樓。

sentences.english: A sauna can improve your health in several ways.
sentences.chinese: 桑拿在很多方面都能促進身體健康。

sentences.english: Conclusion Mineral spring sauna has a good therapeutic effect on coronary heart dise…
sentences.chinese: 結論礦泉桑拿浴對冠心病有明顯的治療作用。

sentences.english: They now golfed and lolled around in swanky saunas.
sentences.chinese: 他們現在打高爾夫，懶洋洋地享受時髦的桑拿。

sentences.english: Members must shower before using the sauna.
sentences.chinese: 使用桑拿前必須先沐浴。

sentences.english: Russians go to the banya, a hot sauna, and since moving here I do that, too.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯人會去蒸桑拿，自從搬來這裏我也這樣做。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the personalities of commercial sex workers CSWs.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價女性桑拿按摩服務人員的人格特點。

sentences.english: After a day of health and beauty in your Finnish portable sauna, why not kick back and light up a smoke -- or 20?
sentences.chinese: 蒸完芬蘭桑拿，何不放鬆一下，抽一支菸還是20支？

definition: to soak in a spa or hot spring
to bathe/to immerse oneself in a warm bath
Arishang Nahiyisi or Wenquan county in Börtala Mongol autonomous prefecture 博爾塔拉蒙古自治州|博尔塔拉蒙古自治州, Xinjiang
